DAKSA Design Repo Change Logs

This page is dedicated to any changes within DAKSA Design Repo. So, it would be easier to see any progress or changes in every single sections. If you are looking for a sections tracker (where we can check a sub-section is completed or not), please go to this page instead.

DateChanges Description
2016, April
6 April, 2016[GENERAL] Repo initialization.
2016, May
May 16, 2016[MOBILE] Initialize Android basic components design.
May 27, 2016[WEB] Develop templates for Sign In Centered Panel, Sign In Half Panel, Sign In Inline Form.
2016, June
June 8, 2016[WEB] Provide CSS & Sass selectors for all Inputs & Buttons components.
June 9, 2016[WEB] Provide CSS & Sass selectors for all Datas, Panels, and Overlay & Messages components.
June 14, 2016
  • [CORPORATE] Logo documentation (including monochrome & greyscale version, clear space, minimum size, specifications, and incorrect usages).
  • [CORPORATE] Finalize corporate typefaces explorations and selections.
June 17, 2016[CORPORATE] Finishing every ideas and raw materials related to corporates' visual identity.
June 28, 2016[MOBILE] Finishing Android basic components design with its guides.
2016, July
2016, August
2016, September
September 21, 2016[GENERAL] Documentation page re-design. Previous design was relatively hard to navigate from one page to another.
2016, October
October 5, 2016[CORPORATE] Web presentation template development.
October 5, 2016[CORPORATE] Final PowerPoint template customization.
October 18, 2016[WEB] Finalize CSS grid framework.
2016, November
November 30, 2016[CORPORATE] Early sketches of product icons.
November 30, 2016[CORPORATE] Polishing final design of SANDRA, EVA, MARISA, CRISA, & TROJAN product icons.
2016, December
December 2, 2016[GENERAL] Migration from Jekyll to Pug. Re-write the documentation skeletons using Pug, so it will be much easier to maintain the doc.
December 23, 2016[CORPORATE] Host-to-host certification web page design.
2017, January
January 10, 2017
  • [CORPORATE] Finalize corporate colors scheme with its gradient combinations and implementation guides.
  • [MOBILE] Finishing documentation for Typography in iOS design
  • [MOBILE] Provide Android & iOS app icons templates.
January 11, 2017[MOBILE] Iconography and Resolutions & Displays for iOS Documentation.
January 13, 2017[WEB] Develop template for Slide Side Bar.
January 16, 2017

  • [WEB] Template development for Fixed Top Bar.
January 18, 2017
  • [WEB] Documentation for Grid Systems' Prelude and Installation & Usage.
  • [WEB] Develop template for Fixed Side Bar.
2017, February
